PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-22211999-12-160,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to Order in Council P.C. 1997-678 that (a) revise the legal description of the lands and premises originally leased to the GREATER MONCTON AIRPORT AUTHORITY, in order to include a triangular piece of land within Parcel 93-1, and (b) revise the Bill of Sale in order to include an Amertek 2500 model fire truck among the chattels.
Attachments
